description: Boutique interior design studio serving luxury residential and hospitality projects. Frequently specifies custom lighting and living room furniture.
Home staging company for premium listings. Needs fast-turn furniture and decor bundles for model homes.
Commercial architecture firm with hospitality and multi-family portfolio. Works with FF&E partners during procurement phase.
Independent lighting design consultancy for restaurants, hotels, and flagship retail spaces.
Residential interior design practice for upper-middle and luxury homes. Maintains preferred vendor list for furniture and lighting.
General contractor focused on tenant improvements and office renovations.
Hospitality operator launching boutique hotels and short-stay properties. Centralized furnishing purchases.
Neighborhood auto repair and tire service chain.
Interior design + project management for coastal luxury homes. Emphasis on statement lighting and custom furniture.
Real estate brokerage with in-house staging referrals.
Corporate interior studio specializing in office and coworking fit-outs. Large recurring furniture orders.
Landscape design and yard maintenance contractor.
FF&E advisory team for hotels and mixed-use developments. Runs structured vendor qualification cycles.
Design-build studio for model homes and sales centers. Sources turnkey furniture packages monthly.
Regional staging provider serving investors and custom home builders.
Dental clinic with two locations.
Retail concept studio for beauty and lifestyle brands. Needs lighting fixtures and display furniture.
Full-service interior design agency for residential renovations and custom build projects.
Event production agency, occasional temporary decor sourcing.
Interdisciplinary design firm covering hospitality, multifamily, and workplace interiors. Runs procurement for client installations.
